document.docTitle: Paterdecolyus magnimaculatus Bian & Shi 2019, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: First record the genus Paterdecolyus of Anabropsinae (Orthoptera: Anostostomatidae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First record the genus Paterdecolyus of Anabropsinae (Orthoptera: Anostostomatidae) from China

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 1.
Paterdecolyus magnimaculatus
sp. nov. A, H.
head in frontal view; B–D, I–K. head and pronotum: B, I. lateral view, C, J. dorsal view, D, K. ventral view; E, L. apex of abdomen in lateral view; F. apex of abdomen in apico-lateral veiw; G, M. subgenital plate in ventral view; A–G. male; H–M. female.

FIGURE 2.
Paterdecolyus magnimaculatus
sp. nov. A–B.
right fore tibia: A. internal view, B. external view.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Measurements (mm). Body length: 6 15.5 –17.5,
♀
21.3–24.3; pronotum length: 6 5.9–7.2,
♀
6.5–7.5; hind femora length: 6 17.5–20.4,
♀
20.5–21.6; hind tibiae length: 6 17.0–19.3,
♀
19.0–20.8; ovipositor length: 12.5– 12.8.

Etymology. Name is derived from the disc of pronotum with 1 pair of large spots.
